content: Which classic American sitcom featured characters named Lucy Ricardo, Ricky Ricardo, Ethel Mertz, and Fred Mertz?

The classic American sitcom that featured characters named Lucy Ricardo, Ricky Ricardo, Ethel Mertz, and Fred Mertz is "I Love Lucy." The show originally aired from 1951 to 1957 and was stars Lucille Ball and Desi Arnaz as Lucy and Ricky Ricardo, and Vivian Vance and William Frawley as Ethel and Fred Mertz. It's considered one of the most influential sitcoms in television history.
